verses.1: Babylon gam tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi: Leitaw lam panin pingpei hong kipat mah bangin, a lauhuai gam panin siatna hong pai hi.
verses.2: A kihtakhuai maangmuhna khat kei tungah hong kigen hi. A sut zo mipa in sut a, a susia zo mipa in susia hi. Elam galkapte aw, kuan to un. Media galkapte aw, umcih un. Babylonʼ piansak khuisatnate khempeuh Pasian in beisak ta hi.
verses.3: Tua ahih ciangin ka kawng na a, nausuak numei in na a sak bangin na ka sa hi. Khua a za thei lo zah dongin a kuncipin ka om a, khua a mu thei lo zah dongin lungkia-in ka om hi.
verses.4: Ka lung vai a, launa in hong sidaangsak hi. Keima lunggulh zan khuamial pen keima linna a suak hi.
verses.5: Amaute in sabuai phahin, sualpuante phah uh a, an ne-in tui dawn uh hi. Uliante aw, tho un; lum, sathau nuh un!
verses.6: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kei tungah: “Pai in; galvil khat koih inla, ama muh bangbang gensak in.
verses.7: Amah in a kopkopin sakol tung tuang mite, la tunga a tuangte, kalaoh tunga a tuangte a muh ciangin limtak, phatakin encik hen,” hong ci hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin a mu pa kiko a, “Topa aw, tausang tungah sun tawntung ka dinga, ka vilna munah zan khuavak ka om hi.
verses.9: En in, sakol tung tuangte a kopkopin hong pai!” a ci hi. A dang khat in, “Babylon cim hi, cim hi. A milim pasian-te khempeuh leilak dongah amah in suksiatsak hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.10: A kicil sa, a kiseep sa keima mite aw, Israel-teʼ Pasian, Vanglian Topa ’ tung panin ka zak sa thu teng note tungah kong gen hi.
verses.11: Edom gam tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi: Seir mual tung panin khat in kei hong sam a, “Galvil pa aw, tu zan bangci hiam? Galvil pa aw, tu zan bangci hiam?” hong ci hi.
verses.12: Galvil pa keimah in, “Zing ni hong suak a, zan khua zong hong mial hi. Thukan nuam na hih leh hong paikik inla hong kan in,” ka ci hi.
verses.13: Arabia gam tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi: Dedan mi khualzin honte aw, Arabia gamlak ah na giak ding uh hi.
verses.14: Tema gam a teeng mite aw, a dangtakte tui puak unla, galtaite an tawh dawn un.
verses.15: Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute, namsau, a kidok sa namsau, a kikeek thal le gal in a phutna panin a hong tai uh ahi hi.
verses.16: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in keima tungah, “Tha cial kum hunte mah bangin kum khat sungin Kedar miteʼ minthanna khempeuh bei ding hi.
verses.17: Kedar mi thaltawi siam a omlaite tawm ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa, Israel Pasian in hih thu gen khinzo hi,” hong ci hi.
